body: The boldest kobolds enjoy riding bizarre beasts into battle.
name: Kobold Riders

sections.ac: 22, touch 14, flat-footed 19 (+5 armor, +3 Dex, +1 natural, +2 shield, +1 size)
sections.other_gear: mwk scale mail, mwk heavy steel shield, mwk lance, 10 gp
sections.special_qualities: crafty, mount (cave salamander or slurk), order of the lion (lion's call), tactician (1/day, 4 rounds, standard action)
sections.name: Kobold Monster Wrangler
sections.skills: Craft (trapmaking) +1, Handle Animal +9, Intimidate +6, Perception +2, Profession (miner) +2, Ride +4
sections.url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Kobolds/Example Kobolds/Kobold Riders/Kobold Monster Wrangler
sections.combat_gear: liquid ice, potion of cure light wounds

sections.ac: 23, touch 12, flat-footed 22 (+8 armor, +1 Dex, +1 natural, +2 shield, +1 size)
sections.special_attacks: banner +2/+1, breath weapon (30-ft. line, 2d6 electricity damage, Reflex DC 14 half, usable every 1d4 rounds), cavalier's charge, challenge (+7, +2, 3/day)
sections.other_gear: +1 banded mail, mwk heavy steel shield, +1 lance, mwk short sword, cloak of resistance +1
sections.feats: Draconic Aspect (blue), Draconic Breath, Improved Initiative, Mounted Combat, Shield Wall, Weapon Focus (lance)
sections.special_qualities: crafty, expert trainer +3, mount (cave salamander), order of the dragon (aid allies), tactician (2/day, 6 rounds, standard action)
sections.name: Kobold Battle Master
sections.skills: Craft (trapmaking) +3, Handle Animal +9, Perception +13, Profession (miner) +3, Ride +5, Stealth +9, Swim +5
sections.url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Kobolds/Example Kobolds/Kobold Riders/Kobold Battle Master
